DOC.brief_summary: Intraluminally shed viable tumor cells might contribute to local recurrence in cancer of the esophagus and the cardia. The aim of the the study was to establish a method of mechanical lavage of the remaining part of the esophagus and, hence, to reduce the intraluminal cancer cells before doing the esophageal anastomosis.
DOC.criteria: histologically confirmed cancer of gastroesophageal junction with indication for surgery missing informed consent
